attributes.action: Remove toll booths from QE2 bridge and double cost of using Dartford Tunnel in order to reduce M25 congestion
attributes.additional_details:
In an attempt to reduce queuing on the M25, remove all toll booths from the QE2 Bridge and double the cost of using the Dartford Tunnel.

Since the vast majority of commuters use both the Bridge and Tunnel each day, this will have minimal  impact on revenues but should reduce the frequent queues that occur on the clockwise M25 as traffic slows at the QE2 tool booths.

Staff previously employed in the QE2 Bridge toll booths could be relocated to the Dartford Tunnel booths and assist members of the public, or made redundant in order to save even more cash.
